member.name: T:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation
member.summary: Represents a tenant's personal and identification details. Encapsulates name, contact, birthdate, and valid ID metadata for validation and comparison operations.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's first name used for identification and display purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's last name used for identification and display purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.FullName
member.summary: Gets the tenant's full name in the format "LastName, FirstName" for display and sorting purposes.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's date of birth used for age verification and identity validation.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.Phone
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's contact phone number used for communication and verification.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.ValidID
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's selected valid ID type used for identity verification and classification.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IDNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant's identification number associated with the selected valid ID type.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IDLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path or resource location of the tenant's valid ID image used for verification.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct with optional tenant metadata. Converts the valid ID string to its corresponding enumeration value.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.IsValid
member.summary: Determines whether all tenant fields are meaningfully initialized and suitable for identity validation.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.op_Equality(REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation)
member.summary: Compares two instances for equality by evaluating all validated fields. Returns true only if both instances are valid and all corresponding properties match. Returns false if either instance fails validation or any field differs.
member.param: The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
member.returns: true if both instances are valid and equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation.op_Inequality(REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenantInformation)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are not equal by comparing all validated fields. Relies on the equality operator to perform the comparison.

member.name: T:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation
member.summary: Represents emergency contact details associated with a tenant. Includes contact name, phone number, relationship, and address for use in urgent situations.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.EmergencyContact
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the emergency contact person associated with the tenant.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.Phone
member.summary: Gets or sets the phone number of the emergency contact person for urgent communication.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.Relationship
member.summary: Gets or sets the nature of the relationship between the tenant and their emergency contact person.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.Address
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical address of the emergency contact person for location reference and correspondence.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct with optional emergency contact details. Assigns values for contact name, phone number, relationship, and address.
member.param: The name of the emergency contact person.
The phone number of the emergency contact person.
The relationship between the tenant and the emergency contact.
The address of the emergency contact person.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.IsValid
member.summary: Determines whether all emergency contact fields are meaningfully initialized and suitable for validation. Returns true if none of the fields are null, empty, or whitespace-only; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.op_Equality(REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation,REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation)
member.summary: Compares two instances for equality by evaluating all validated fields. Returns true only if both instances are valid and all corresponding properties match. Returns false if either instance fails validation or any field differs.
member.param: The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
member.returns: true if both instances are valid and equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation.op_Inequality(REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation,REMS.Tenants.EmergencyInformation)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are not equal by comparing all validated fields. Returns true only if both instances are valid and at least one property differs. Returns false if either instance fails validation or all fields match.
member.param: The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
member.returns: true if both instances are valid and not equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation
member.summary: Represents the tenancy details of a tenant. Includes room type, duration, assigned room number, internet plan, and tenancy status.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.RoomType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of room assigned to the tenant, such as single, double, or shared.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date of the tenant's occupancy period within the assigned room.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the end date of the tenant's occupancy period, marking the conclusion of the tenancy.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.RoomNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the designated room number assigned to the tenant for the duration of their stay.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.InternetPlan
member.summary: Gets or sets the internet subscription plan selected by the tenant for their room.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the current status of the tenancy, such as active, pending, terminated, or completed.

member.name: P:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the tenancy in days, excluding monthly rentals. Returns -1 if the room type is monthly. Throws an exception if the end date is earlier than the start date.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct with optional tenancy details. Assigns values for room type, tenancy duration, room number, internet plan, and status.
member.param: The type of room assigned to the tenant.
The start date of the tenancy period.
The end date of the tenancy period.
The room number assigned to the tenant.
The internet plan selected for the room.
The current status of the tenancy.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.IsValid
member.summary: Determines whether the tenancy information is valid by ensuring all required fields are properly initialized. Returns true if none of the fields are null, empty, or default; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.op_Equality(REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation)
member.summary: Compares two instances for equality by evaluating all validated fields. Returns true only if both instances are valid and all corresponding properties match. Returns false if either instance fails validation or any field differs.
member.param: The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
member.returns: true if both instances are valid and equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation.op_Inequality(REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation,REMS.Tenants.TenancyInformation)
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are not equal by comparing all validated fields. Returns true only if both instances are valid and at least one property differs. Returns false if either instance fails validation or all fields match.
member.param: The first instance to compare.
The second instance to compare.
member.returns: true if both instances are valid and not equal; otherwise, false.
